    How to stop disposable email services such as mailinator from registering to your website

    It is very easy, simply add the gem “valid_email2”

    Installation

    Add this line to your application’s Gemfile: gem “valid_email2”

    And then execute: $ bundle

    Usage

    Use with ActiveModel

    More options: https://github.com/lisinge/valid_email2
